text: Centro Desportivo e Cultural de Montalegre is a Portuguese Sport and Football club based in the parish of Montalegre in the Vila Real District. It was founded in 1964 and currently plays in the Campeonato de Portugal, third tier of Portuguese football. == Current squad == == References == *CDC Montalegre *Centro Desportivo e Cultural de Montalegre :: Estadísticas :: Títulos :: Títulos :: Historia :: Goles :: Próximos Partidos :: Resultados :: Noticias :: Vídeos :: Fotos :: Plantilla :: ceroacero.es *Centro Desportivo e Cultural de Montalegre Category:Football clubs in Portugal Category:Association football clubs established in 1964
title: C.D.C. Montalegre
